Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.18952602]HIV-1:inhibition of polymerase activity of HIV-1 RT(Ki =57 ± 19 μM);inhibition of PHA-P-activated PBMCs infected with HIV-1-LAI(EC50=290 nM,associated with Pep-1).NOTE:Ki:inhibition constants
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Mechanism of action: HIV-1 reverse transcriptase (RT) plays an essential multifunctional role in the replication of the virus, by catalyzing the synthesis of double-stranded DNA from the single strand retroviral RNA genome.The peptide could inhibit the activity of reverse transcriptase.

Literature.Title: A new generation of peptide-based inhibitors targeting HIV-1 reverse transcriptase conformational flexibility.
Literature.Author: Agopian A, Gros E, Aldrian-Herrada G, Bosquet N, Clayette P, Divita G.
